M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.main.RiskGameApplication
 
MapCreator - Class in com.java.controller.map
MapCreator implements the logic to make it possible for a user to create map on console.
MapCreator(GameMap) - Constructor for class com.java.controller.map.MapCreator
Constructor to initialize local map object
MapEditor - Class in com.java.controller.map
MapEditor implements the logic to make it possible for a user to edit an already loaded map into the game.
MapEditor(GameMap) - Constructor for class com.java.controller.map.MapEditor
Constructor to initialize local map object
MapLoader - Class in com.java.controller.map
MapLoader manages the complete map generation operations for the game, in particular it allows user to load the default map, load user's .map file, create map, and edit map.
MapLoader() - Constructor for class com.java.controller.map.MapLoader
 
MapValidator - Class in com.java.controller.map
MapValidator handles the map validation part of the game.
MapValidator() - Constructor for class com.java.controller.map.MapValidator
 
MAX_PLAYERS - Static variable in class com.java.model.gamedata.GameData
The maximum number of players is 6.
MIN_PLAYERS - Static variable in class com.java.model.gamedata.GameData
The minimum number of players is 2.
